TopicTitle: The Official Kerbin Cup Tournament Thread - Final Entries Posted

Articles.Content:
Also I want this at the top of the page, cause it got me hella psyched to be in this.

Why thank you sir!

I think Rune and Whackjob should put their heads together and compete in the 'unofficial' version - I want to see what they come up with! ESPECIALLY Whack!

Indeed. You guys can still form a team and compete when new teams are selected a few challenges from now.

After the teams are eliminated and a grand winner is selected, new teams will be picked for future competitions until everyone is eliminated and a second winner selected and so on if I am right. Right?

Edited June 17, 2014 by Avera9eJoe

Man, this is gonna be some competition... and congrats to Team Clown_Baby, you may not have made it on the forum, but you seem to be in the Reddit teams!

I look forward to seeing what the teams come up with - I would participate in the unofficial version, but mid-refuel mission >.< might try something before the deadline though...

Why thank you sir!

Indeed. You guys can still form a team and compete when new teams are selected a few challenges from now.

After the teams are eliminated and a grand winner is selected, new teams will be picked for future competitions until everyone is eliminated and a second winner selected and so on if I am right. Right?

Wait, reallly?

Edited June 17, 2014 by Spartwo

Can we push it, and submit a GIF?

This is all I want, what if the full awesomeness of our craft can't be captured in one picture?

Why thank you sir!

You're very welcome, that was a baller speech

and congrats to Team Clown_Baby, you may not have made it on the forum, but you seem to be in the Reddit teams!

Hey thanks a lot, I actually don't mind, as long as we made an official team. The only problem is the reddit comments setup doesn't allow for discussion the way it does here. I kind of want to set up a team reddit thread on the forum.

But that would be some behind enemy lines sht

Edited June 17, 2014 by clown_baby

Hey thanks a lot, I actually don't mind, as long as we made an official team. The only problem is the reddit comments setup doesn't allow for discussion the way it does here. I kind of want to set up a team reddit thread on the forum.

But that would be some behind enemy lines sht

Yeah, know what you mean... I kinda felt a bit dirty seeing what was going on over on Reddit! not on a team, but felt a bit like Industrial Spying or something lol..

I hope you guys do get to submit .gifs, they always make for the more interesting entries xD

After the teams are eliminated and a grand winner is selected, new teams will be picked for future competitions until everyone is eliminated and a second winner selected and so on if I am right. Right?

I haven't read anything saying that. Where did you get that info, Joe?

I think Rune and Whackjob should put their heads together and compete in the 'unofficial' version - I want to see what they come up with! ESPECIALLY Whack!

Whackjob is a league of his own, he functions in a universe with a couple extra dimensions, adding him to any team would automatically disintegrate the other teams, turning their bodies to ashes.

Whackjob is KSP god mode.
Hyperedit is allowed?! That's just unfair! Any fool can make a giant statue and hyperedit it to Tylo!

Hyperedit is allowed?! That's just unfair! Any fool can make a giant statue and hyperedit it to Tylo!

I donÃ‚Â´t like hyperedit neither, but I think the spirit of this first challenge is "go for aesthetics, make a pretty cup". IÃ‚Â´m sure the next challenges will be more strict and complex.

I kinda felt a bit dirty seeing what was going on over on Reddit! not on a team, but felt a bit like Industrial Spying or something lol..

Earlier tonight...

*Whistles* Gee, what's with the weird lay out.....

Ah! There's noone here! Just a shrub. Just a shrub...

Earlier tonight...

*Whistles* Gee, what's with the weird lay out.....

Ah! There's noone here! Just a shrub. Just a shrub...

Quoted because it shouldn't languish at the bottom of a page. Love that gif.

Why thank you sir!

Indeed. You guys can still form a team and compete when new teams are selected a few challenges from now.

After the teams are eliminated and a grand winner is selected, new teams will be picked for future competitions until everyone is eliminated and a second winner selected and so on if I am right. Right?

Wait, what? We do have a notion of pulling of an unofficial second tier tournament in my team, but to my knowledge we just aren't going to compete in the official one, the eight teams fighting for the "real" cup are already picked up.

Whackjob is a league of his own, he functions in a universe with a couple extra dimensions, adding him to any team would automatically disintegrate the other teams, turning their bodies to ashes.

Whackjob is KSP god mode.

It is indeed weird to be quoted next to that master of excess, our paths rarely cross. And quite flattering, BTW. But not only is our fanbase hugely different in size (IMHO), our playstyles are completely different. Not that I don't like seeing his every now and then!

Rune. I go more with "engineering" and less with "excessive engineering". But yeah, "if it's worth doing, it's worth overdoing".

Ok I'm done complaining, time to build

Edited June 17, 2014 by clown_baby

Compare this:

to this:

And that statue could even reach orbit!
One looks sexy.

One looks sexy.

The other looks like it's saying "kill meeeee"

Regarding Hyperedit, remember that this is not an objectively scored challenge, but one where the winner will be chosen by public vote. Assuming that "full disclosure" of mods used is required, voters will be free to shun the Hyperedited entries.

Compare this:

http://i.imgur.com/baTnx8U.png

to this:

http://i.imgur.com/oKZcHF1.png

And that statue could even reach orbit!

Great context. Your point being?

Rune. I can also throw 500 parts at my comp.

Edited June 17, 2014 by Rune
idk, id like to vote on whackjobs rendition of the iron giant.

Are there any specific reasons to picking the ones you did?

It came down to popular vote amongst myself and the mod team.

man!, I was sleeping!

super happy to participate! :-)

Rowsdower, can the picture be photoshoped in any way after it's taken? (some contrast, colours, blablabla)

Preferably not.

*Ahem...*

Wait, what? We do have a notion of pulling of an unofficial second tier tournament in my team, but to my knowledge we just aren't going to compete in the official one, the eight teams fighting for the "real" cup are already picked up.

If the teams who weren't chosen would like to compete in their own tournament, it *would* be kind of fun to pit the Kerbin Cup winner against the winner of, I don't know, the "Kerbal Championship League?"

nonono, no gifs now, we're already working under the basis that there wont be movement.., so NO GIFS NOW! =)
